Original meaning 本义: Meaning ethics.

English senses 英语理解: ethics, morality, virtue

Usage example 用法举例: 道德 dào dé (morals)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 232

Shuowen 说文解字: 外得於人內得於已也從直從心

悳字的基本解释

悳
dé
同“德”。

悳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［déㄉ］
“惪1”的旧字形。“德1”的古字。

悳字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　悳； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页388第41
【唐韻】【正韻】多則切【集韻】【韻會】的則切，?音得。【說文】外得於人，內得於己也。从直从心。【六書精蕰】直心爲悳。生理本直，人行道而有得於心爲悳。小篆加彳，取行有所復之義。【長箋】論語，以直報怨，以悳報悳，則知直卽是悳。通溷用德，非是。時尙茂密，故悳字幾廢。【隂復春曰】道悳之悳，《說文》从直从心。德字从彳从㥁，升也。今道悳字皆作德，而悳㥁字但爲古文矣。別詳德字註。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　悳; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 388 41
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Cut if there is more [Ji Yun] [Rhyme], cut it? [Speaking texts] The outside is from others, and the inside is from yourself. From straight to heart. 【Six Books】Straight-hearted. The physiology is straightforward, and the sidewalks are awkward. Xiaozhuan plus 彳, taking the line has the meaning of recovery. [Long Jian] The Analects of Confucius, if you report grievances directly, and report grievances by grievances, you know that grievances are grievances. It's not true. The time is dense and dense, so the word is a little useless. [Yin Fuchun said] Dao is desperate, "Suo Wen" from straight to heart. The German word is from 彳from 㥁 to rise. Nowadays, the word "Dao" is a virtue, while the word "Dao" is an ancient text. Don't detail the German character note.
